Manifesto.line1: Adapt or die. That's how software works.
Manifesto.line2: I chose AI as my copilot.

Services.title: SERVICES
Services.subtitle: What I can do for your business
Services.webDevDesc: Your website from scratch: fast, mobile-ready and optimized to get found on Google.
Services.aiDesc: Save hours every week. Auto-replies, emails, invoicing, stock management... AI handles it.
Services.mobileDesc: Let your customers book themselves, no calls or WhatsApps needed. Automatic reminders included.
Services.cloudDesc: Sell your products 24/7. Catalog, cart, secure payments and management from your phone.
Services.customDesc: Need something that doesn't exist? I'll build it. Admin panels, integrations, custom apps.
Services.cta: Tell me your idea — I reply in 24h

Portfolio.subtitle: Real projects
Portfolio.title: PORTFOLIO
Portfolio.project1Desc: Custom-built virtual gymkhana platform. Users create interactive challenges with tests, timers and access codes to gift unique experiences.
Portfolio.project1Tech: Next.js · React · TypeScript · Tailwind · Auth · DB
Portfolio.project2Desc: Professional website for a sports physiotherapy clinic. Elegant design with online booking system, detailed services and SEO optimized to rank on Google.
Portfolio.cta: Does your business need something like this?

Process.title: PROCESS
Process.subtitle: How we work together
Process.step1Desc: Tell me what your business needs. No commitment, no tech jargon. Response within 24 hours.
Process.step2Desc: I study your case: what your business does, who your customers are and what solution fits best.
Process.step3Desc: Clear proposal: what we'll do, timeline and price. Fixed budget, no surprises.
Process.step4Desc: I build your project and show you progress every week. You give feedback, I adjust. Deliveries every 1-2 weeks.
Process.step5Desc: Your website or app live and running. I show you how to manage it and stay on for support.

Team.subtitle: Tyrell Files
Team.title: TEAM
Team.bio: I've worked at Centro Zaragoza, Tragsatec and ISYC building software for large organizations. Now I bring that same quality to your business, with direct contact and AI as my ally.
Team.quote: "All those moments will be lost in time, like tears in rain."

FAQ.q1: How much does a website for my business cost?
FAQ.a1: It depends on what you need. A professional website with your own domain starts from €1,500. Online bookings, e-commerce or extra features are quoted separately. I'll give you a fixed quote with no obligation after understanding your case.
FAQ.q2: How long does it take to be ready?
FAQ.a2: A professional website can be ready in 2-4 weeks. More complex projects (online store, booking app) take 1-3 months. I show you progress every week so you can see how it's going.
FAQ.q3: Do I need to know about technology to have a website?
FAQ.a3: Not at all. I handle everything technical. You just tell me what your business needs and I translate it into a digital solution. Plus, I teach you to manage your site with a simple admin panel.
FAQ.q4: Can I update the website myself afterwards?
FAQ.a4: Yes. All websites include an easy admin panel where you can change texts, photos, prices and hours without touching code. And if you need help, I'm here.
FAQ.q5: What if I don't have a logo, photos or copy?
FAQ.a5: Don't worry, it's more common than you think. I can guide you with logo design, use professional stock photography and write your website copy. All included in the project.
FAQ.q6: How much does monthly maintenance cost?
FAQ.a6: Hosting and domain cost €10-30/month depending on the project. Technical maintenance (updates, security, backups) starts from €50/month. Many clients don't need ongoing maintenance.
FAQ.q7: Do you work remotely or only in person?
FAQ.a7: I work with clients anywhere in the world. The process is 100% digital: video calls, online deliveries and smooth communication via WhatsApp or email. No matter where you are.
FAQ.q8: What's this AI thing? Is it useful for my business?
FAQ.a8: AI can automate repetitive tasks in your business: answer common questions, send appointment reminders, manage inventory, generate social media content... If something takes up your time every day, AI can probably do it for you.

Footer.description: Websites, apps and AI automation for your business. Direct contact, no middlemen.

Demo.peluqueria_r3: Good service and pleasant atmosphere. Prices are reasonable for the quality they offer.
